person.persName: William Wallace Bruce (Fayette County, Kentucky, harness manufacturer and city councilman.)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, hemp manufacturer and city councilman. Kentucky native. Son of John Bruce and Margaret Ross Hutton Bruce. Married to Elizabeth T. Colesberry Bruce in 1840. Father of Margaret N. Bruce, Mary C. Bruce, Laura Sutton Bruce, Alice K. Bruce, Elizabeth C. Bruce, Fannie C. Bruce, and Julia Bruce. Manufacturer in Fayette County in 1850. Owned thirty-four enslaved persons in Fayette County in 1850. Hemp manufacturer in Lexington, Fayette County, in 1860. Owned thirty-seven enslaved persons in Lexington in 1860. Manufacturer in Fayette County in 1863. Member of the Lexington City Council in 1864.
